Class BinaryClassifierStats

java.lang.Object
BinaryClassifierStats
public class BinaryClassifierStats extends Object
Represents the statistics of a binary classifier, with tools to calculate all kinds of useful statistics.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BinaryClassifierStats(Matrix classifierOutput, Matrix expectedOutput)
    Instantiates the binary classifier statistics, calculating them and caching them.
